short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A developer tool that adds a button to reload only css stylesheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A developer tool that adds a button to reload only css stylesheets. It does this by appending a timestamp to the css file path, e.g. `/path/to/file.css` into `/path/to/file.css?7123654789`
